description.original: Improved, configurable auto formatting as typing
description.translation: typing 时可配置的自动格式化功能已优化

dict..setDesc(\"Enable debug log to console.\: .setDesc("启用调试日志输出到控制台。")
dict..setDesc(\"Enable indication of a zone's: .setDesc("启用使用指示区域起点的功能 '\u2B50\uFE0F'")
dict..createEl(\"span\", { text: \"Enter conv: .createEl("span", { text: "在这里输入转换、选择和删除规则。注意事项：" })
dict..createEl(\"li\", { text: \"Each line is: .createEl("li", { text: "每行是一条规则。排在前面的规则优先级更高。" })
dict..createEl(\"li\", { text: 'Lines startin: .createEl("li", { text: 'Lines starting with "#" are treated as comments and ignored. Inline comments are also allowed' })
dict..createEl(\"li\", { text: \"Certain char: .createEl("li", { text: "Certain characters ' | \\ must be escaped with backslashes \\." })
dict..createEl(\"li\", { text: \"Whatever tab: .createEl("li", { text: "当插件设置选项卡退出时，无论你当前处于哪个选项卡，该选项卡所对应的配置文件都将被选中" })
dict..createEl(\"li\", { text: \"The 'global': .createEl("li", { text: "“全局” 配置文件将始终处于活动状态" })
